front.title: RSVP-TE Extensions for Associated Bidirectional LSPs

abstract.t: This document describes Resource reSerVation Protocol (RSVP) extensions to bind two point-to-point unidirectional Label Switched Paths (LSPs) into an associated bidirectional LSP. The association is achieved by defining the new Association Types in (Extended) ASSOCIATION object. In addition, RSVP extensions allow asymmetric upstream and downstream bandwidths for the bidirectional LSP.
